description:
Data extracted from records of tickets on file with NYS DMV. The tickets were issued to motorists for violations of:
 NYS Vehicle & Traffic Law (VTL),
 Thruway Rules and Regulations
 Tax Law
 Transportation Law
 Parks and Recreation Regulations
 Local New York City Traffic Ordinances and
 NYS Penal Law pertaining to the involvement of a motor vehicle in acts of assault, homicide, manslaughter and criminal negligence resulting in injury or death.

name: Traffic Tickets Issued: Five Year Window
